name: Suomen Romukauppiaiden Liitto ry / Finnish Scrapdealers Association
goal:
To promote the interests of the scrap metal recycling industry. To work with government and local bodies on policies affecting scrap metal recycling. To promote co operation and networking between our members to help solve common problems within the industry. To inform and educate the public about the scrap metal industry
The association also co operates with the law inforcement by sharing the information of stolen material among the whole metal industry and scrapdealers.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Single market
euInitiatives: Circular Economy Package, The interface between, Chemical, product and waste legislation, Waste Shipment regulation, POP regulation, Other relevant issues for ELV and WEEE
